markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** L --- This lustrous lute has a polished body that changes to show whatever decorations or carvings you find most appealing, or which best reinforce the story of the song you're currently playing (as a free action). Its frets are inlaid with mother of pearl. With its mix of enchantment and illusion magic, it's favored by many traveling minstrels. While playing the lute, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Entertainer's Lute **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **Cantrip** [_infectious enthusiasm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=932)
  • **1st** [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356)
Entertainer's Lute (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **2nd** [_calm emotions_](/Spells.aspx?ID=31), [_mirror image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=197)
  • **3rd** [_enthrall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [_heroism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=149), [_illusory creature_](/Spells.aspx?ID=158)
Entertainer's Lute (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** L --- The item bonuses are +2.
  • **4th** [_glibness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=135), [_infectious melody_](/Spells.aspx?ID=933)
  • **5th** [_hallucination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=144), _illusory creature_, [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), [_suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)
name: Entertainer's Lute
